snippet: The agency said it would require more rigorous authentication before releasing information and refunds, and would try to pinpoint patterns of fraud.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service announces broad effort to improve security standards in order to protect against type of identity theft and fraud that allowed criminals to steal personal information and divert refunds for tens of thousands of taxpayers; will collaborate with tax preparation firms and state officials to create rigorous new authentication system.
lead_paragraph: The agency said it would require more rigorous authentication before releasing information and refunds, and would try to pinpoint patterns of fraud.

headline.main: I.R.S. Adds New Safeguards to Thwart Identity Theft and Fraud
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Adds New Guards to Thwart ID Theft
